node.address: Calle 35 # 3 - 30 1er piso, Plaza Santo Domingo , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value: Bourbon St Boutique Hostel has 3 dorms, each dorm has two full bathrooms, 42 beds in total (each bed is a private pod with its own black out, 2 plugins, and a night light so you will enjoy complete privacy in a dorm bed), all the hostel has A/C 24/7 to cool off the warm Cartagena weather, we also have a small pool, a kitchenette, 24/7 bilingual and local receptionist , free breakfast, wi-fi, DirecTV, lockers, bar at the pool and discounts in our award winning Bourbon St Bar-Restaurant with live music and dj’s just steps from the hostel, where a mix of locals and travelers always hang out. Here you can enjoy the 50% on meals and local beers plus no cover to all the events.

You can arrive to our hostel, either by taxi or walking. We are located at the most important plaza of the city, so it’s easy to get there. The hostel is across the ancient Santo Domingo church. The address is Santo Domingo Street 35 #3-30. Plaza Santo Domingo. All nightlife, shops, bars, restaurants, museums and activities are all within a short walking distance from the hostel.

If you want to experience the warm waters of the Colombian Caribbean and other activities near or in Cartagena, just ask our receptionist and we can help you organize all the activities offered in and near Cartagena
Set 100 m from Bolivar Park in Cartagena de Indias, Bourbon St Hostal Boutique welcomes guests with a restaurant and bar.
All rooms include a shared bathroom and air-conditioning throughout the day. Bourbon St Hostal Boutique features free WiFi throughout the property.
There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. An American breakfast is served daily, included in the rate.
Cartagena's Gold Museum is 200 m from Bourbon St Hostal Boutique. Rafael Núñez International Airport is 5 km from the property.
Centro is a great choice for travellers interested in restaurants, architecture and food.

description.description: Welcome to our boutique hostel considered “One of the 6 best Hostels in Colombia” by Luxe Hostels and the best place in Old Town Cartagena to enjoy the magic of the oldest city in South America. Our hostel is located in Plaza Santo Domingo within the walled city of Cartagena, The hostel is a colonial house that was property of the Señores Condes de La Santa Cruz. Bourbon Hostal Boutique was created for travelers from around the world who are looking to explore new places and experience new cultures with a local point of view, meeting interesting, like-minded people along the way.
